## Sentry Configuration

## Structured Logging
- Page view and session tracking in dashboard
- URL analysis lifecycle logging \(start, validation, success, failure\)
- Search form interaction logging
- History management operation logging
- History list rendering and interaction logging
- Metrics grid display logging

## Custom Metrics

### Counter Metrics
- analysis.request, analysis.success, analysis.failed
- analysis.validation_failed, analysis.simulated_failure
- search.submitted, search.completed
- history.item_added, history.item_selected, history.item_clicked
- history.cleared

### Distribution Metrics
- analysis.api_delay_ms, analysis.duration_ms
- analysis.failure_duration_ms
- metrics.yoy_growth_displayed, metrics.nrr_displayed
- metrics.dau_displayed, metrics.csat_displayed, metrics.nps_displayed

### Gauge Metrics
- analysis.yoy_growth, analysis.nrr, analysis.dau
- history.size, history.success_count, history.error_count
- metrics.health_score
- viewport.width, search.input_length

## Explicit Exception Capturing
- Analysis errors with full context \(URL, duration, request count\)
- Simulated failures with pattern information
- Custom fingerprinting for error grouping
- Comprehensive tags and contexts for debugging

## Features
- Test Sentry button for manual error verification
- Every 3rd request fails to demonstrate error tracking
- Health score calculation from business metrics
- Performance timing tracking throughout analysis flow
- User interaction tracking across all components
